init_reaction_role.name: Initialize Reaction Role
init_reaction_role.description: Create a new reaction role configuration
init_reaction_role.success: {{-icon}} | {{-author}}, reaction role configuration has been **initialized** successfully!
init_reaction_role.error: {{-icon}} | {{-author}}, failed to initialize reaction role configuration. Please try again.
init_reaction_role.already_exists: {{-icon}} | {{-author}}, a reaction role configuration is already in progress. Please complete or cancel the current session first.
init_reaction_role.session_not_found: {{-icon}} | {{-author}}, no active reaction role configuration session found.
init_reaction_role.session_cancelled: {{-icon}} | {{-author}}, reaction role configuration session has been **cancelled**.
init_reaction_role.session_completed: {{-icon}} | {{-author}}, reaction role configuration has been **completed** and saved successfully!
init_reaction_role.timeout: {{-icon}} | {{-author}}, reaction role configuration session has **timed out**. Please start over.
init_reaction_role.invalid_input: {{-icon}} | {{-author}}, invalid input provided. Please try again.
init_reaction_role.permission_error: {{-icon}} | {{-author}}, you don't have permission to manage roles in this server.
init_reaction_role.bot_permission_error: {{-icon}} | {{-author}}, I don't have the required permissions to manage roles.
init_reaction_role.channel_not_found: {{-icon}} | {{-author}}, the specified channel was not found.
init_reaction_role.role_not_found: {{-icon}} | {{-author}}, one or more specified roles were not found.
init_reaction_role.message_not_found: {{-icon}} | {{-author}}, the specified message was not found.
init_reaction_role.webhook_error: {{-icon}} | {{-author}}, failed to create or access webhook. Please check permissions.
init_reaction_role.embed_error: {{-icon}} | {{-author}}, failed to create embed message. Please try again.

welcome.title: 🎭 Reaction Role Configuration
welcome.description:
Welcome to the reaction role configuration wizard! I'll guide you through setting up a reaction role system.

**Available Methods:**
• 🎯 **Reaction (Emoji)** - Users react with emojis to get roles
• 🔘 **Button** - Users click buttons to get roles
• 📋 **Select Menu** - Users select from dropdown menus

Please choose your preferred method:
welcome.footer: React with the corresponding emoji to continue

select_roles.title: 🎭 Select Roles
select_roles.description:
You've selected: **{{method}}** with **{{roleChangeType}}**, **{{replyType}}**, and **{{messageType}}**

**Available Roles:** {{roleCount}} roles below the bot's highest role

Please select the roles you want to include in this reaction role system:
select_roles.footer: Select one or more roles from the dropdown menu

roles_selected.title: 🎭 Roles Selected
roles_selected.description:
You've selected: **{{method}}** with **{{roleChangeType}}**, **{{replyType}}**, and **{{messageType}}**

**Selected Roles ({{roleCount}}):**
{{rolesList}}

**Next Steps:**
1. Configure message content
2. Complete setup

Please choose your next action:
roles_selected.footer: Use the buttons below to continue with setup

select_method.title: 🎭 Select Method
select_method.description:
You've selected: **{{method}}**

**Available Role Change Types:**
{{-roleChangeTypes}}

Please choose the role change type:
select_method.footer: React with the corresponding emoji to continue

select_reply_type.title: 🎭 Select Reply Type
select_reply_type.description:
You've selected: **{{method}}** with **{{roleChangeType}}**

**Available Reply Types:**
{{replyTypes}}

Please choose the reply type:
select_reply_type.footer: React with the corresponding emoji to continue

select_message_type.title: 🎭 Select Message Type
select_message_type.description:
You've selected: **{{method}}** with **{{replyType}}**

**Available Message Types:**
• 🤖 **Bot Message** - I'll send the message
• 🔗 **Webhook** - Use webhook to send message
• 📝 **Own Message** - Use existing message (Reaction only)

Please choose the message type:
select_message_type.footer: Select from the dropdown menu to continue

select_channel.title: 🎭 Select Channel
select_channel.description:
You've selected: **{{method}}** with **{{-messageType}}**

**Next Step:** Choose the channel where the bot/webhook message will be sent.

Please select a text channel from the dropdown menu:

configure_webhook.title: 🎭 Configure Webhook
configure_webhook.description:
You've selected: **{{method}}** with **{{-messageType}}**

**Next Step:** Configure the webhook settings (title and image).

Please click the button below to open the webhook configuration modal:
configure_webhook.footer: Click the configure webhook button to continue

create_message.title: 🎭 Create Message
create_message.description:
You've selected: **{{method}}** with **{{-messageType}}**

**Next Step:** Create the message that will be sent to the channel.

Please click the button below to open the message creation modal:
create_message.footer: Click the create message button to continue

configure_message.title: 🎭 Configure Message
configure_message.description:
You've selected: **{{method}}** with **{{-messageType}}**

**Next Step:** Configure the message content and embed settings.

Please click the button below to open the configuration modal:
configure_message.footer: Click the configure button to continue

open_config_modal.title: 🎭 Configure Message Content
open_config_modal.description:
You've selected: **{{method}}** with **{{-messageType}}**

**Next Step:** Fill in the message content, webhook URL, and embed settings in the modal.

**Available Embed Settings:**
• Title and description
• Color customization
• Message content

Please click the button below to open the configuration modal:
open_config_modal.footer: Click the open modal button to continue

define_roles.title: 🎭 Define Roles
define_roles.footer: Use the buttons below to manage roles and complete setup

confirm.title: 🎭 Confirm Configuration
confirm.footer: React with ✅ to confirm or ❌ to cancel

reaction.single_role: **🎯 Single Role** - Only one role allowed
reaction.select_only: **➕ Select Only** - Can only add roles
reaction.unselect_only: **➖ Unselect Only** - Can only remove roles

button.single_role: **🎯 Single Role** - Only one role allowed
button.select_only: **➕ Select Only** - Can only add roles
button.unselect_only: **➖ Unselect Only** - Can only remove roles

select.single_role: **🎯 Single Role** - Only one role allowed
select.select_only: **➕ Select Only** - Can only add roles
select.unselect_only: **➖ Unselect Only** - Can only remove roles

reply_types.dm: **💬 DM** - Send private message to user

message_types.bot: **🤖 Bot Message** - I'll send the message
message_types.bot_description: The bot will send the message with reaction roles
message_types.webhook: **🔗 Webhook** - Use webhook to send message
message_types.webhook_description: Use a webhook to send the message with reaction roles
message_types.own: **📝 Own Message** - Use existing message (Reaction only)
message_types.own_description: Use an existing message for reaction roles (Reaction method only)

messages.role_management_coming_soon: {{-icon}} | Role management feature will be implemented soon!
messages.embed_preview_description: Below is a preview of how your message will look:

config.title: Configuration Settings
config.bot_message_placeholder: Enter the message the bot should send...
config.embed_image_note: Note: Embed image configuration will be available in a future update

errors.timeout: Configuration session timed out. Please start over.
errors.permission_denied: Permission denied. Please check bot permissions.
errors.role_not_found: Role not found. Please check role ID.
errors.channel_not_found: Channel not found. Please check channel ID.
errors.message_not_found: Message not found. Please check message ID.
errors.webhook_failed: Failed to create webhook. Please check permissions.
errors.embed_failed: Failed to create embed. Please try again.
errors.database_error: Database error occurred. Please try again.
errors.guild_not_found: Guild not found. Please try again.
errors.bot_not_found: Bot member not found. Please try again.
errors.no_manageable_roles: No manageable roles found. The bot needs roles below its highest role to manage.
errors.role_selection_failed: Failed to process role selection. Please try again.
